title: Butter with Sun-dried Tomatoes, Basil and Parmesan

ingredients.content: 50 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
50 g sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add sun-dried tomatoes and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Serve as an accompaniment to bread.
